title: Regular Fit Sweatshorts
schema_description: Regular-fit, comfortable sweatshorts in lightweight fabric with soft, brushed inside and a classic silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband, diagonal welt side pockets, and an open back pocket.

title: Relaxed-Fit Seersucker Shorts
schema_description: Relaxed-fit shorts in cotton seersucker with a casual but not oversized silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband, zip fly with button, side-seam pockets, and welt back pockets.

title: Baggy Denim Shorts
schema_description: 5-pocket shorts in rigid cotton denim. Regular waist, zip fly, and dropped gusset. Rounded legs and baggy fit from seat to hem with plenty of room around legs.

title: Loose-Fit Basketball Shorts with DryMove™
schema_description: Loose-fit, knee-length basketball shorts in functional fabric made with DryMove™ to wick away moisture from skin and keep you comfortably dry while moving. Elasticized, drawstring waistband, discreet side pockets, and a small slit at hems. Accent-colored side stripes extending to and around hems.

title: Regular Fit Linen-Blend Shorts
schema_description: Shorts in an airy, woven cotton and linen blend with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Drawstring and covered elastic at waistband and zip fly with button. Side pockets and a welt back pocket. Cotton and linen blends combine the softness of cotton with the sturdiness of linen, creating a beautiful, textured fabric that is breathable and perfectly draped.

title: Regular-Fit Chino Shorts
schema_description: Regular-fit chino shorts in soft cotton twill with a comfortable, classic silhouette. Covered elastic at sides of waistband, zip fly with button, diagonal side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button.

schema_description: Regular-fit shorts in an airy, woven cotton and linen blend with a comfortable, classic silhouette.
